definitions.text: the act of forming or establishing something
examples: the constitution of a PTA group last year
it was the establishment of his reputation
he still remembers the organization of the club

definitions.text: an organization founded and united for a specific purpose
the persons (or committees or departments etc.) who make up a body for the purpose of administering something
examples: he claims that the present administration is corrupt
the governance of an association is responsible to its members
he quickly became recognized as a member of the establishment

definitions.text: a public or private structure (business or governmental or educational) including buildings and equipment for business or residence
(ecology) the process by which a plant or animal becomes established in a new habitat
the cognitive process of establishing a valid proof
